plugin.name: SqueezeDSP
plugin.title: SqueezeDSP
plugin.desc: DSP for Squeezebox server - provides PEQ and DSP.
plugin.creator: Jonathan Fox
plugin.changes: PEQ and DSP working using JSON config files - Replaced CamillaDSP with SoX for PEQ, better Housekeeping, Binary now .Net 7.0. Had to remove pretty JSON formatting tidy up file names copy some static strings to hidden input fields for use in js files.
